commenter_b: Upon last survey, they only found ~three smelt in the delta! All the smelt live in temperature controlled tanks at UC Davis... to the tune of about $2.5 million tax payer dollars per year. THE SMELT ARE GONE, no matter what they do in the delta. If it weren't the smelt, another fish or animal would be chosen to take its place. We're suckers... hook, line, and sinker! Israel had severe water shortages too... they are now able to be a water exporter. They built reclamation, desalinization, and now have more than they need. California is building an f'ing bullet train to nowhere! But, what if a smelt got pulled into the desalinization plant intake?
